rows.label: tlk70000048_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Kai's been acting odd lately. He won't
eat with me. Truth is, I think he's
avoiding me.

rows.label: tlk70000048_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Augusto said all he needed was a
good meal and a proper booze-up
to wash his troubles away.

rows.label: tlk70000048_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I should clock Augusto for even
suggesting the idea, but you can't
take a drunkard's words to heart.

rows.label: tlk70000048_04_msg0004
rows.name:
He got me thinking, though - the one I
should be asking is Kai. He's the only
one who really knows what's wrong.
